metadata.title: Premium Doyle - Teardrop Fedora Hat - 100% Wool Felt - Crushable for Travel - Water Resistant - Unisex
features: Classic men's fedora hat with a modern teardrop crown that allows the crown to follow the shape of the head more closely, resulting in a more contemporary and comfortable fit.
Sweat wicking internal sweatband. Easy Care: Hat can be surface cleaned with a clothes brush or clean damp cloth.
Water repellent, withstanding showers (but should not be worn in heavy rain as this may cause it to lose some of its distinctive shape).
Wide brim to provide the maximum protection from the elements. Gentle shaped down at front and rear to protect the eyes and neck.
Handmade in Ecuador from 100% wool mid weight, felt in ethical conditions. Results in a breathable and natural finish. Brim - 5.5cm wide. Crown - 11cm tall.
description: A stylish new winter collection from Borges & Scott - the UK's leading Panama Hat specialist.

Unisex adult fedora hat in various colours including charcoal grey / black finished with contrast band with classic bow detail on the right side. The crown has the classic fedora shape with the distinctive indent on the dome and two dimples at the front of the crown creating a narrow point. The brim slopes down at the front and curves up at the back- think Humphrey Bogart in “Casablanca”!

The inside is finished with a soft inner band for additional comfort. This hat is handmade from 100% wool felt and is water repellent (ie. it will withstand light showers, but we would advise against wearing it in heavy rain where the felt could become saturated with water). The Doyle Fedora is perfect for travel as it can be rolled to fit easily in your suitcase or hand luggage.

The classic hat: Suits men and women, good for Summer and Winter. Also, perfect for a party where you want that Homburg / Stetson / Cowboy / Indiana Jones /Gangster style look! Available in Small, Medium, Large, XL and XXL sizes.

title: Classic And Durable Hat! Love It!
AKIO&AQUIRAX Mens Fedora Hats
